Any ads you upload will be stored in your Ad Library. You can search for your ads by name or use sort menus to filter ads by status or size.

Adding ads to your Ads library

In the right sidebar you will find options to upload ads by type. Ads uploaded to your Ad Library are not added to campaigns automatically; this allows you to prepare your ads before submitting them for approval in active campaigns.

Make sure that you are familiar with our creative guidelines. We have specific ad size, format, and content guidelines that you will need to comply with in order to upload your ad and ultimately have it approved to run in your campaign.

Editing ads in your Ads library

Individual Edits

To edit an individual ad, hover your mouse over the ad you want to edit. The option to “Edit” will appear. Click the “Edit” button to pull up editing options for your ad.

  • For web ads, you can edit your ad’s name or destination URL.
  • For Facebook ads, you can edit your ad’s name, destination URL, text to accompany your ad image, or manage an optional call to action button.

Bulk Edits

To perform bulk edits on your ads, you must be in list view.

Check the boxes next to individual ads you wish to edit, or select all. Once you’ve selected all the ads you wish to take action with, click the “Edit” button that should appear just above your list of ads.

Bulk Edit Destination URLs

1. Select all ads whose destination URL you want to update, then click “Edit”. This can be a mix of both Facebook and web ads.
2. Edit the destination URL field on the first ad listed in the portal.
3. Click the “Apply to all…” button to have the URL applied to all selected ads.
4. “Save”.

Bulk Edit Facebook Text

1. Select all ads you wish to update, then click “Edit”
2. Edit Facebook text fields as needed. To apply changes across all selected ads, click the “Apply to…” option that appears.
3. “Save”.

Bulk Edit Facebook Buttons

1. Select all ads you wish to update, then click “Edit”.
2. Under Button, drop down the menu and select the call ot action you would like to apply to your ad.
3. To bulk apply the button to all selected ads, click the “Apply button to…” link directly below your selection.
4. “Save”.
